articles.content: New Delhi: Apple Cider is a type of vinegar made with crushed apples, yeast, and sugar and is used as an ingredient in foods like salad dressings, pickles, and marinades. It has been used for millenn… [+7714 chars]

articles.title: High cholesterol: THESE seemingly mild issues might be your body urging you to check LDL - Times of India
